achievements.name: Start Your Engines
achievements.description: Finished any official Time Trial.

achievements.name: Aspiring Kart Racer
achievements.description: Earned the bronze medal in all official Karts Time Trials.

achievements.name: Formula Kart
achievements.description: Earned the gold medal in all official Karts Time Trials.

achievements.name: Clean Race
achievements.description: Finished any official Karts Time Trial without damage.

achievements.name: Speed Demon
achievements.description: Finished any official Karts Time Trial with an average speed of 85 kmph or more.

achievements.name: Competitive Shooter
achievements.description: Finished any official Firing Drill.

achievements.name: Aspiring Sharpshooter
achievements.description: Earned the bronze medal in all official Firing Drills.

achievements.name: Firing Drills Champion
achievements.description: Earned the gold medal in all official Firing Drills.

achievements.name: Clean Drill
achievements.description: Finished any official Firing Drill without penalties (competitive rules).

achievements.name: Bonus Targets
achievements.description: Hit every bonus target in any official Firing Drill with bonus targets.

achievements.name: Hero's Journey
achievements.description: Placed any objective for players as Zeus.

achievements.name: Deity for a Day
achievements.description: Played as Zeus for a total of 24 hours.

achievements.name: Godly Creations
achievements.description: Placed a total of 200 objects as Zeus across all scenarios.

achievements.name: Worshiper
achievements.description: Pinged your Zeus.

achievements.name: Merciful God
achievements.description: Reacted to 5 player pings as a Zeus by using the control shortcut.

achievements.name: This is War
achievements.description: Started your first Arma 3 scenario - welcome!

achievements.name: Scapegoat
achievements.description: Killed by a player while remotely controlling a unit as Zeus.

achievements.name: First Deployment
achievements.description: Completed the Bootcamp campaign. Get ready for your next deployment!

achievements.name: K.I.A.
achievements.description: Died in any Bootcamp campaign scenario. If you see the flash, it's already too late ...

achievements.name: Drill Instructor
achievements.description: Guided your recruits through all Bootcamp Zeus training stages.

achievements.name: Ready for Duty
achievements.description: Passed all Bootcamp Zeus training stages as a recruit.

achievements.name: Star Recruit
achievements.description: Completed the bootcamp combat training stage without hurting yourself or others.

achievements.name: Virtual Reality
achievements.description: Booted up the VR simulation for the first time.

achievements.name: Virtual Command
achievements.description: Completed all official VR commanding courses.

achievements.name: Real Virtuality
achievements.description: Completed all official VR training courses.

achievements.name: Lock and Load
achievements.description: Saved a custom load-out in VR Arsenal.

achievements.name: Contributor
achievements.description: Published a scenario to Steam Workshop.

achievements.name: Subscriber
achievements.description: Subscribed to a scenario on Steam Workshop.

achievements.name: Perfectionist
achievements.description: Updated an existing Steam Workshop scenario to a newer version.

achievements.name: Relentless Creator
achievements.description: Spent over 100 hours creating and testing in the scenario editor.

achievements.name: Virtual Pilot
achievements.description: Completed all official VR helicopter courses.

achievements.name: Advanced Virtual Pilot
achievements.description: Completed all official VR helicopter courses while using the Advanced Flight Model.

achievements.name: Virtual NOE Flight
achievements.description: Completed the Low Flight stage in the advanced VR helicopter course under 40 seconds.

achievements.name: Aspiring Stunt Pilot
achievements.description: Earned the bronze medal in all official Helicopter Time Trials.

achievements.name: Golden Rotorhead
achievements.description: Earned the gold medal in all official Helicopter Time Trials.

achievements.name: Nap of the Earth
achievements.description: Flew under an average of 22 meters AGL in any official Helicopters Time Trial.

achievements.name: Dust-Off
achievements.description: Completed 10 medevac tasks in official Support multiplayer.

achievements.name: Airbridge
achievements.description: Transported 10 groups of soldiers into battle without being killed in official Support multiplayer.

achievements.name: Showtime
achievements.description: Tried any 5 official showcases.

achievements.name: Meet and Greet
achievements.description: Visited all official Faction Showcases to check out their weapons and vehicles on display.

achievements.name: Showcasing
achievements.description: Completed all official Showcases.

achievements.name: Virtual Shooter
achievements.description: Completed all official VR Weapon Handling courses.

achievements.name: Bad Omens
achievements.description: Discovered the secret room in Showcase Firing From Vehicles.

achievements.name: Dodge This
achievements.description: Completed Showcase Marksmen without injury.

achievements.name: Hacker
achievements.description: Downloaded Intel 5 times in official End Game multiplayer.

achievements.name: Carrier
achievements.description: Became the Carrier in official End Game multiplayer for the first time.

achievements.name: Hip Shooter
achievements.description: Finished any official Marksmen Firing Drill without resting or deploying your weapon (competitive rules).

achievements.name: Conservative Sharpshooter
achievements.description: Finished any official Firing Drill by hitting all targets and spending no more than a single round per target.

achievements.name: Virtual Vehicle Inspection
achievements.description: Visited the Garage in VR Arsenal for the first time.

achievements.name: Mass Virtual Destruction
achievements.description: Disabled all target vehicles in VR Arsenal at the same time.

achievements.name: Rock Stable
achievements.description: Deployed any weapon for the first time.

achievements.name: Marksmen Weapon Master
achievements.description: Tried all 7 Marksmen DLC weapons.

achievements.name: Model Student
achievements.description: Completed all Eden Editor tutorials.

achievements.name: Puppeteer
achievements.description: Played a scenario as a non-player character in the Eden Editor.

achievements.name: Dressing Doll
achievements.description: Configured a character loadout using the Arsenal in the Eden Editor.

achievements.name: New Dimension
achievements.description: Imported a 2D scenario into the Eden Editor.

achievements.name: Better With Friends
achievements.description: Completed each mission of the Apex Protocol campaign with the help of your teammates.

achievements.name: Lone Wolf
achievements.description: Completed each mission of the Apex Protocol campaign alone.

achievements.name: The Bigger Picture
achievements.description: Completed each mission of the Apex Protocol campaign chronologically.

achievements.name: None The Wiser
achievements.description: Completed the 04 Heart of Darkness campaign mission without alerting the enemy.

achievements.name: Welcome to Tanoa
achievements.description: Visited the crown jewel terrain of Arma 3 Apex for the first time.

achievements.name: Transport Service
achievements.description: Loaded or unloaded 5 vehicles into any suitable transport vehicle.

achievements.name: Game Plan
achievements.description: Drew at least one line on the map.

achievements.name: With Mark of the Serpent
achievements.description: Tried out Viper Special Purpose Suit.

achievements.name: Changing the Balance
achievements.description: Modified your difficulty options and saved the custom settings.

achievements.name: Mr. Anderson
achievements.description: Equipped any variant of the ADR-97 submachine gun.

achievements.name: Bomberman
achievements.description: Destroyed a ground target with a bomb in Showcase Fighter Jets.

achievements.name: Deadstick Landing
achievements.description: Landed your damaged aircraft for repairs in Showcase Fighter Jets.

achievements.name: Get Arrested
achievements.description: Successfully completed your first carrier landing.

achievements.name: Armed and Dangerous
achievements.description: Customized any compatible vehicle's dynamic loadout in Eden Editor.

achievements.name: Punch Out
achievements.description: Safely ejected from any compatible jet using an ejection seat.

achievements.name: Remnants of War
achievements.description: Cleared all explosives from Oreokastro and completed the Remnants of War campaign.

achievements.name: Memories of Oreokastro
achievements.description: Recalled all memories in Oreokastro during the Remnants of War campaign.

achievements.name: Humanitarian
achievements.description: Faced with difficult decisions in the Remnants of War campaign, you went for the more humane options.

achievements.name: Explosive Treasure
achievements.description: Found and triggered all hidden training mines in the IDAP faction Showcase.

achievements.name: Collateral Damage
achievements.description: Completed the 3 VR simulations in Showcase Laws of War without any civilian collateral damage.

achievements.name: Aspiring Aid Supplier
achievements.description: Earned the bronze medal in all official IDAP Time Trials.

achievements.name: Fast Aid
achievements.description: Earned the gold medal in all official IDAP Time Trials.

achievements.name: Different Perspective
achievements.description: Completed each role of the Beyond Hope operation.

achievements.name: Forward Observer
achievements.description: Destroyed all APCs defending Orino by artillery strike in the Beyond Hope operation.

achievements.name: Beyond Hope
achievements.description: Completed the Beyond Hope operation.

achievements.name: Changing Places
achievements.description: Completed each role of the Stepping Stone operation.

achievements.name: Stepping Stone
achievements.description: Completed the Stepping Stone operation.

achievements.name: Seasoned Warfighter
achievements.description: Completed one mission of the Stepping Stone operation without dying.

achievements.name: Steel Pegasus
achievements.description: Completed the Steel Pegasus operation.

achievements.name: Savior
achievements.description: Rescued both pilot and medic in the LZ Nowhere mission of the Steel Pegasus operation.

achievements.name: Lifeline
achievements.description: Transported all injured soldiers to the LZ Blazer in the Breaking Through mission of the Steel Pegasus operation.

achievements.name: Tank Rally
achievements.description: Earned the bronze medal in all official Tanks Time Trials.

achievements.name: Hammer Time
achievements.description: Earned the gold medal in all official Tanks Time Trials.

achievements.name: From Within
achievements.description: Spent 3 hours inside an armored vehicle.

achievements.name: Easy Money
achievements.description: Destroyed more tanks than Zulu in Showcase Tank Destroyers.

achievements.name: Steel Sniper
achievements.description: Hit a moving enemy tank with an APFSDS round at a distance of at least 3500 meters.

achievements.name: Commander
achievements.description: Spent 3 hours as a tank commander.

achievements.name: Size Doesn't Matter
achievements.description: Spent 3 hours in the Nyx tankette.

achievements.name: In It Together
achievements.description: Spent 24 hours in any tank with a full human crew in multiplayer.

achievements.name: Loyalist
achievements.description: Played Arma 3 for 200 hours.

achievements.name: This is War 2.00
achievements.description: Played Arma 3 after its 2.00 platform update.

achievements.name: Fortress of Fun
achievements.description: Cleared the CoF: Gray Firing Drill in under 2:00.

achievements.name: Lost and Found
achievements.description: Found and marked the 5 famous lost works of art by Dutch masters in Showcase Cultural Property.

achievements.name: Dressed to Impress
achievements.description: Tried on the new Parade Uniform or Formal Suit.

achievements.name: Art and Soul
achievements.description: Visited the Lars Blanken Gallery in Amsterdam.

achievements.name: Connoisseur
achievements.description: Inspected 20 labels in the Lars Blanken Gallery in Showcase Art of War.

achievements.name: Still Life
achievements.description: Published a composition to Steam Workshop.

achievements.name: Arma Invaders
achievements.description: Won the main menu mini-game during a special event.

achievements.name: Mod Lover
achievements.description: Started Arma 3 with at least 10 mods loaded - thanks to all modders for their splendid work!

achievements.name: Arma'd
achievements.description: Got Arma'd into the air while inside a ground vehicle.
